verses.verse: כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֮ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִה֒ <S%H3069><s%> GOD שַׁ֜עַר <S%H8179><s%> The gate הֶחָצֵ֤ר <S%H2691><s%> court הַפְּנִימִית֙ <S%H6442><s%> of the inner הַפֹּנֶ֣ה <S%H6437><s%> that looketh קָדִ֔ים <S%H6921><s%> toward the east יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become סָג֔וּר <S%H5462><s%> shall be shut שֵׁ֖שֶׁת <S%H8337><s%> the six יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> days הַֽמַּעֲשֶׂ֑ה <S%H4639><s%> working וּבְי֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> and in the day הַשַּׁבָּת֙ <S%H7676><s%> the sabbath יִפָּתֵ֔חַ <S%H6605><s%> it shall be opened וּבְי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> the day הַחֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> of the new moon יִפָּתֵֽחַ׃ <S%H6605><s%> it shall be opened

וּבָ֣א <S%H935><s%> shall enter הַנָּשִׂ֡יא <S%H5387><s%> And the prince דֶּרֶךְ֩ <S%H1870><s%> by the way אוּלָ֨ם <S%H197><s%> of the porch הַשַּׁ֜עַר <S%H8179><s%> of [that] gate מִח֗וּץ <S%H2351><s%> without וְעָמַד֙ <S%H5975><s%> and shall stand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by מְזוּזַ֣ת <S%H4201><s%> by the post הַשַּׁ֔עַר <S%H8179><s%> of the gate וְעָשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> shall prepare הַכֹּהֲנִ֗ים <S%H3548><s%> and the priests אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֽוֹלָתוֹ֙ <S%H5930><s%> his burnt offering וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁלָמָ֔יו <S%H8002><s%> and his peace offerings וְהִֽשְׁתַּחֲוָ֛ה <S%H7812><s%> and he shall worship עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at מִפְתַּ֥ן <S%H4670><s%> at the threshold הַשַּׁ֖עַר <S%H8179><s%> of the gate וְיָצָ֑א <S%H3318><s%> then he shall go forth וְהַשַּׁ֥עַר <S%H8179><s%> but the gate לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יִסָּגֵ֖ר <S%H5462><s%> shall not be shut עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> until the evening

וְהִשְׁתַּחֲו֣וּ <S%H7812><s%> shall worship עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> Likewise the people הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land פֶּ֚תַח <S%H6607><s%> at the door הַשַּׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> of this gate הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he בַּשַּׁבָּת֖וֹת <S%H7676><s%> in the sabbaths וּבֶחֳדָשִׁ֑ים <S%H2320><s%> and in the new moons לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וְהָ֣עֹלָ֔ה <S%H5930><s%> And the burnt offering אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יַקְרִ֥ב <S%H7126><s%> shall offer הַנָּשִׂ֖יא <S%H5387><s%> that the prince לַֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשַּׁבָּ֗ת <S%H7676><s%> in the sabbath שִׁשָּׁ֧ה <S%H8337><s%> [shall be] six כְבָשִׂ֛ים <S%H3532><s%> lambs תְּמִימִ֖ם <S%H8549><s%> without blemish וְאַ֥יִל <S%H352><s%> and a ram תָּמִֽים׃ <S%H8549><s%> without blemish

וּמִנְחָה֙ <S%H4503><s%> And the meat offering אֵיפָ֣ה <S%H374><s%> [shall be] an ephah לָאַ֔יִל <S%H352><s%> for a ram וְלַכְּבָשִׂ֥ים <S%H3532><s%> for the lambs מִנְחָ֖ה <S%H4503><s%> and the meat offering מַתַּ֣ת <S%H4991><s%> to give יָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> as he shall be able וְשֶׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> of oil הִ֥ין <S%H1969><s%> and an hin לָאֵיפָֽה׃ <S%H374><s%> to an ephah

וּבְי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And in the day הַחֹ֔דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> of the new moon פַּ֥ר <S%H6499><s%> bullock בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> a young בָּקָ֖ר <S%H1241><s%> bull תְּמִימִ֑ם <S%H8549><s%> without blemish וְשֵׁ֧שֶׁת <S%H8337><s%> and six כְּבָשִׂ֛ם <S%H3532><s%> lambs וָאַ֖יִל <S%H352><s%> and a ram תְּמִימִ֥ם <S%H8549><s%> they shall be without blemish יִהְיֽוּ׃ <S%H1961><s%> become

וְאֵיפָ֨ה <S%H374><s%> an ephah לַפָּ֜ר <S%H6499><s%> for a bullock וְאֵיפָ֤ה <S%H374><s%> and an ephah לָאַ֙יִל֙ <S%H352><s%> for a ram יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> And he shall prepare מִנְחָ֔ה <S%H4503><s%> a meat offering וְלַ֨כְּבָשִׂ֔ים <S%H3532><s%> and for the lambs כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after תַּשִּׂ֖יג <S%H5381><s%> shall attain יָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> according as his hand וְשֶׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> of oil הִ֥ין <S%H1969><s%> unto and an hin לָאֵיפָֽה׃ <S%H374><s%> to an ephah

וּבְב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> shall enter הַנָּשִׂ֑יא <S%H5387><s%> And when the prince דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> in by the way אוּלָ֤ם <S%H197><s%> of the porch הַשַּׁ֙עַר֙ <S%H8179><s%> of [that] gate יָב֔וֹא <S%H935><s%> he shall go וּבְדַרְכּ֖וֹ <S%H1870><s%> by the way יֵצֵֽא׃ <S%H3318><s%> and he shall go forth

וּבְב֨וֹא <S%H935><s%> shall come עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> But when the people הָאָ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בַּמּֽוֹעֲדִים֒ <S%H4150><s%> in the solemn feasts הַבָּ֡א <S%H935><s%> he that entereth דֶּרֶךְ־ <S%H1870><s%> in by the way שַׁ֨עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate צָפ֜וֹן <S%H6828><s%> of the north לְהִֽשְׁתַּחֲוֹ֗ת <S%H7812><s%> to worship יֵצֵא֙ <S%H3318><s%> shall go out דֶּרֶךְ־ <S%H1870><s%> by the way שַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate נֶ֔גֶב <S%H5045><s%> of the south וְהַבָּא֙ <S%H935><s%> and he that entereth דֶּרֶךְ־ <S%H1870><s%> by the way שַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate נֶ֔גֶב <S%H5045><s%> of the south יֵצֵ֖א <S%H3318><s%> shall go forth דֶּרֶךְ־ <S%H1870><s%> by the way שַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate צָפ֑וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> of the north לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> No יָשׁ֗וּב <S%H7725><s%> he shall not return דֶּ֤רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> by the way הַשַּׁ֙עַר֙ <S%H8179><s%> of the gate אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> whereby he came in ב֔וֹ כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> over נִכְח֖וֹ <S%H5226><s%> over against [יֵצְאוּ כ] (יֵצֵֽא׃ <S%H3318><s%> shall go ק)

וְֽהַנָּשִׂ֑יא <S%H5387><s%> And the prince בְּתוֹכָ֤ם <S%H8432><s%> in the midst בְּבוֹאָם֙ <S%H935><s%> of them when they go in יָב֔וֹא <S%H935><s%> shall go in וּבְצֵאתָ֖ם <S%H3318><s%> and when they go forth יֵצֵֽאוּ׃ <S%H3318><s%> shall go forth

וּבַחַגִּ֣ים <S%H2282><s%> And in the feasts וּבַמּוֹעֲדִ֗ים <S%H4150><s%> and in the solemnities תִּהְיֶ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become הַמִּנְחָה֙ <S%H4503><s%> the meat offering אֵיפָ֤ה <S%H374><s%> shall be an ephah לַפָּר֙ <S%H6499><s%> to a bullock וְאֵיפָ֣ה <S%H374><s%> and an ephah לָאַ֔יִל <S%H352><s%> to a ram וְלַכְּבָשִׂ֖ים <S%H3532><s%> and to the lambs מַתַּ֣ת <S%H4991><s%> to give יָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> as he is able וְשֶׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> of oil הִ֥ין <S%H1969><s%> and an hin לָאֵיפָֽה׃ <S%H374><s%> to an ephah ס

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When יַעֲשֶׂה֩ <S%H6213><s%> shall prepare הַנָּשִׂ֨יא <S%H5387><s%> Now when the prince נְדָבָ֜ה <S%H5071><s%> a voluntary עוֹלָ֣ה <S%H5930><s%> burnt offering אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or שְׁלָמִים֮ <S%H8002><s%> or peace offerings נְדָבָ֣ה <S%H5071><s%> voluntarily לַֽיהוָה֒ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וּפָ֣תַֽח <S%H6605><s%> [one] shall then open ל֗וֹ אֶת <S%H853><s%> הַשַּׁ֙עַר֙ <S%H8179><s%> him the gate הַפֹּנֶ֣ה <S%H6437><s%> that looketh קָדִ֔ים <S%H6921><s%> toward the east וְעָשָׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> and he shall prepare אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֹֽלָתוֹ֙ <S%H5930><s%> his burnt offering וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁלָמָ֔יו <S%H8002><s%> and his peace offerings כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> he יַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> as he did בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשַּׁבָּ֑ת <S%H7676><s%> on the sabbath וְיָצָ֛א <S%H3318><s%> then he shall go forth וְסָגַ֥ר <S%H5462><s%> [one] shall shut אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשַּׁ֖עַר <S%H8179><s%> the gate אַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> and after צֵאתֽוֹ׃ <S%H3318><s%> his going forth

וְכֶ֨בֶשׂ <S%H3532><s%> [of] a lamb בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> of the first שְׁנָת֜וֹ <S%H8141><s%> year תָּמִ֗ים <S%H8549><s%> without blemish תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> prepare עוֹלָ֛ה <S%H5930><s%> a burnt offering לַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Thou shalt daily לַֽיהֹוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD בַּבֹּ֥קֶר <S%H1242><s%> it every בַּבֹּ֖קֶר <S%H1242><s%> morning תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> thou shalt prepare אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%>

וּמִנְחָה֩ <S%H4503><s%> a meat offering תַעֲשֶׂ֨ה <S%H6213><s%> And thou shalt prepare עָלָ֜יו <S%H5921><s%> with בַּבֹּ֤קֶר <S%H1242><s%> for it every morning בַּבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <S%H1242><s%> morning שִׁשִּׁ֣ית <S%H8345><s%> the sixth part הָֽאֵיפָ֔ה <S%H374><s%> of an ephah וְשֶׁ֛מֶן <S%H8081><s%> of oil שְׁלִישִׁ֥ית <S%H7992><s%> and the third part הַהִ֖ין <S%H1969><s%> of an hin לָרֹ֣ס <S%H7450><s%> to temper with אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַסֹּ֑לֶת <S%H5560><s%> the fine flour מִנְחָה֙ <S%H4503><s%> a meat offering לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD חֻקּ֥וֹת <S%H2708><s%> ordinance עוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> by a perpetual תָּמִֽיד׃ <S%H8548><s%> continually

[וַעָשׂוּ כ] (יַעֲשׂ֨וּ <S%H6213><s%> accomplish ק) אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֶּ֧בֶשׂ <S%H3532><s%> the lamb וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּנְחָ֛ה <S%H4503><s%> and the meat offering וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשֶּׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> and the oil בַּבֹּ֣קֶר <S%H1242><s%> every morning בַּבֹּ֑קֶר <S%H1242><s%> morning עוֹלַ֖ת <S%H5930><s%> burnt offering תָּמִֽיד׃ <S%H8548><s%> [for] a continual פ

כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהֹוִ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> GOD כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If יִתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> give הַנָּשִׂ֤יא <S%H5387><s%> If the prince מַתָּנָה֙ <S%H4979><s%> a gift לְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> unto any מִבָּנָ֔יו <S%H1121><s%> of his sons נַחֲלָת֥וֹ <S%H5159><s%> the inheritance הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> he לְבָנָ֣יו <S%H1121><s%> thereof shall be his sons' תִּֽהְיֶ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> shall belong אֲחֻזָּתָ֥ם <S%H272><s%> it [shall be] their possession הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> he בְּנַחֲלָֽה׃ <S%H5159><s%> by inheritance

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> if יִתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> But if he give מַתָּנָ֜ה <S%H4979><s%> a gift מִנַּחֲלָת֗וֹ <S%H5159><s%> of his inheritance לְאַחַד֙ <S%H259><s%> to one מֵֽעֲבָדָ֔יו <S%H5650><s%> of his servants וְהָ֤יְתָה <S%H1961><s%> shall belong לּוֹ֙ עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> shall be his until שְׁנַ֣ת <S%H8141><s%> then it shall be his to the year הַדְּר֔וֹר <S%H1865><s%> of liberty וְשָׁבַ֖ת <S%H7725><s%> after it shall return לַנָּשִׂ֑יא <S%H5387><s%> to the prince אַ֚ךְ <S%H389><s%> only נַחֲלָת֔וֹ <S%H5159><s%> but his inheritance בָּנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> shall be his sons' לָהֶ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> like תִּהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> shall belong

וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not יִקַּ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> shall not take הַנָּשִׂ֜יא <S%H5387><s%> Moreover the prince מִנַּחֲלַ֣ת <S%H5159><s%> inheritance הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people's לְהֽוֹנֹתָם֙ <S%H3238><s%> by oppression מֵאֲחֻזָּתָ֔ם <S%H272><s%> them out of their possession מֵאֲחֻזָּת֖וֹ <S%H272><s%> out of his own possession יַנְחִ֣ל <S%H5157><s%> inheritance אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּנָ֑יו <S%H1121><s%> [but] he shall give his sons לְמַ֙עַן֙ <S%H4616><s%> so אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יָפֻ֣צוּ <S%H6327><s%> be not scattered עַמִּ֔י <S%H5971><s%> that my people אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man מֵאֲחֻזָּתֽוֹ׃ <S%H272><s%> from his possession

וַיְבִיאֵ֣נִי <S%H935><s%> After he brought בַמָּבוֹא֮ <S%H3996><s%> me through the entry אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> at עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> the side כֶּ֣תֶף <S%H3802><s%> which [was] at the side הַשַּׁעַר֒ <S%H8179><s%> of the gate אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַלִּשְׁכ֤וֹת <S%H3957><s%> chambers הַקֹּ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H6944><s%> into the holy אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> for הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> of the priests הַפֹּנ֖וֹת <S%H6437><s%> which looked צָפ֑וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> toward the north וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> and behold שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> there מָק֔וֹם <S%H4725><s%> and behold there [was] a place [בַּיַּרְכֹתִם כ] (בַּיַּרְכָתַ֖יִם <S%H3411><s%> border ק) יָֽמָּה׃ <S%H3220><s%> westward ס
